entry.title: Jamming mitigation call
entry.summary: Clara Shikhelman has shared the agenda for an upcoming meeting taking place on Monday, December 12th at 7 pm UTC. The meeting will cover three main topics: which parameters should be considered in reputation-based solutions, Circuitbreaker, and the Onion relay network and its potential uses. Clara has also provided a link to the call for those interested in attending. Additionally, Clara had sent out a prior email on November 27th to share the agenda for the call on November 28th. The agenda included an overview of solutions under discussion, reputation (local/tokens), and fees. Links to conversations regarding these topics were also shared in the email.
